title: Video
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Video**

[CBS Sunday Morning, May 2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/www.marksimonson.com/video/FontClip.mp4) hosted graciously by [Mark Simonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20Simonson)  
 [Goudy in his studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/www.typeculture.com/academic_resource/movies/movs/index.php?ID=Goudy_S3&TYPE=mov&W=320&H=240) (from [Typeculture.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/www.typeculture.com/))

**Discussion:**  
 [Typographic Films](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/node/30381)  
 [Typography videos](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/node/43707)

**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Video**

In addition to appearing in quite a few videos himself, [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter) also designed a photo-typesetting typeface family for [Mergenthaler Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117043500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mergenthaler%20Linotype) in the 1970s, which he called Video. Video was designed to withstand all of the terrible scaling and scrunching that photo-typesetters who do to their type, instead of buying more weights.
author: paul d hunt
